title: How to write an article for a website - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can write an article for some website who are accepting guest publisher. All are not accept guest author but most the webmaster accept guest post or guest blogging. You have to need find who are accepting guest blogging. And then send offer off them. What is your niche topic?

First, you need to research a topic. Secondly, you need to dig on what others have written in regarding to the chosen topic. Once that is done you start putting the various pieces together. It is a good practice to optimize (SEO) the article for search engine visibility if you can. Depending on how many words you want the article to be. You might have to do a thorough research of you intend on writing on 1000–2000 words. I hope this helps you get started at-least.
